recipe.title: Pear Cranberry Sparklers
ingredients: 1/2 cup unsweetened cranberry juice (or 3/4 cup cranberry juice cocktail for a sweeter drink)
Seltzer or Prosecco, to top off
instructions: Combine nectar and juice up to 3 days in advance. Pour into champagne flutes or wineglasses; top with seltzer or Prosecco right before serving.
